articles.title: Source - Eagles, QB Jalen Hurts agree to $255M deal - ESPN.co.uk
articles.description: The Eagles and quarterback Jalen Hurts have reached agreement on a five-year, $255 million extension, including $179.304 million guaranteed, a source told ESPN's Adam Schefter.
